Initializes Encanta with a custom listener for when a new message is received
init(Context, String, OnChatEnabledToggled) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Initializes Encanta with a custom listener for when real-time chat is enabled/disabled through the Encanta portal.
init(Context, String, OnNewMessageReceived, OnChatEnabledToggled) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Initializes Encanta with a custom listener for when a new message is received as well as when real-time chat is enabled/disabled through the Encanta portal.
isEnabled() - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Check to see if Real-time Chat is enabled for this app through the Encanta web portal.

LOG_TAG - Static variable in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
 

O

OnChatEnabledToggled - Interface in com.citrix.saas.encanta.listeners
Callback interface to handle when an event is passed through the messaging framework.
onChatToggled(boolean) - Method in interface com.citrix.saas.encanta.listeners.OnChatEnabledToggled
When the real-time chat is enabled or disabled through the web console, onChatToggled() will be called, allowing your app to respond as necessary when this happens.
OnNewMessageReceived - Interface in com.citrix.saas.encanta.listeners
Callback interface for Encanta users to utilize if they desire to show in-app messaging for new support chats

P

pauseNotifications(boolean) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Conditionally pauses all notifications from Encanta to your app through the custom listeners.

R

receivedMessage() - Method in interface com.citrix.saas.encanta.listeners.OnNewMessageReceived
Called if the user received a support chat while the app wasn't running or the user had no cell service
receivedMessage(String) - Method in interface com.citrix.saas.encanta.listeners.OnNewMessageReceived
Called when a new message is received by Encanta while the app is running
registerForPush(String) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Registers the user for push notifications when an incoming message is received through Encanta.

S

setChatToggledListener(OnChatEnabledToggled) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Explicitly set the custom listener which is called when real-time chat is enabled/disabled through the Encanta portal for your app.
setIntProperty(String, int) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Sets an int user analytics property for the current user that will be displayed in the Encanta web portal in the contextual information on the current user
setLogLevel(int) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Allows the logging level within Encanta to be set if necessary.
setMessageReceivedListener(OnNewMessageReceived) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Explicitly set the custom listener which is called when a new message through Encanta is received.
setPromptForUserName(boolean) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Used to determine whether or not to prompt the user to enter their name when first starting the support chat activity.
setStringProperty(String, String) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta
Sets a String user analytics property for the current user that will be displayed in the Encanta web portal in the contextual information on the current user

Sets a userId to be used for this user.
setUserName(String) - Static method in class com.citrix.saas.encanta.Encanta

Used to start the main Encanta activity for support chats.
